LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays a progress circle based on how much of the user’s profile is filled out.

property.name: requiredFields
property.label: Required Fields For Progression
property.description: Include all the fields that are required to calculate the profile completion percentage. Separate each required field with a as “;”

property.name: resultFormat
property.label: Result Format
property.description: This controls what will display in the center of the progress circle. For example, Percentage will display the percentage only.

property.name: size
property.label: Size
property.description: Sets the width and height. Default 150px.

property.name: strokeWidth
property.label: Line Width
property.description: Controls the width of the line. Default 5.

property.name: strokeLineCap
property.label: Line Ending
property.description: Controls the shape of the ends of lines.

property.name: progressColor
property.label: Progress Color
property.description: This is the color of the progress portion of the tracker. The default color is the community's border color.

property.name: remainingColor
property.label: Remaining Color
property.description: This is the color of the remaining portion of the tracker. The default color is the community's border color.

property.name: innerCircleColor
property.label: Inner Circle Color
property.description: This will be the background color of inner circle. Default is none.

property.name: thresholdPercent
property.label: Threshold Percent
property.description: Optionally set a threshold percentage which can change the color of the progress tracker.

property.name: thresholdColor
property.label: Threshold Color
property.description: This is the color of the tracker after the threshold percentage.

property.name: includeText
property.label: Include any text?
property.description: Check the box if you would like to include text to the right of the progress circle.

property.name: linkText
property.label: Link Text
property.description: Optional link text for the Custom Link URL

property.name: linkUrl
property.label: Link URL
property.description: Optional navigation url. If no url is provided the link will navigate to the current user’s profile page.

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class Name
property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.
